attributes.action: Clean up the disgraceful and morally bankrupt atitude atributed to MPs self interests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The concepts of accountability, honesty and decency seem to have been expunged from the political 'classes' in the UK.  It is incument on the PM to remedy the dishonourable way in which our elected representatives actively seek to avoid public accountabaility for the expenditure on our taxes on their luxuries.  Rejuvenate their morals with compulsion for honesty and clean up the image of our parliamentarians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
